website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice for a wide age range of kids, if you're looking for a bounce house that does much more than just bouncing.
pros: We loved how much more this bouncy house offered compared to its competitors
In addition to a large bouncing area, there is a climbing wall, basket ball and soccer nets, a sizable slide, and a fort
The fort has a small roof for sun protection
Caters to a slightly older age group, but could accommodate toddlers as well
cons: Heavy and difficult to fold and put away

customer_reviews.title: My bouncy house brings all the kids to the yard, and i'm like take off your shoes you little $h1tz.
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Its probably 70-75 lbs so my wife can't lug it over and set it up when i'm not home. No chance of folding it up nicely and fitting it into the provided bag. About half sticks over the top, but its fine. I can still move it. The original pump died during the second use, but amazon support is amazing and looked up the blower rating and sent me a comparable one overnight for free since this was for my daughters 3rd b-day party. Keep an eye on bigger kids (over 4?), if they hang over the rail near the top of the slide they could topple out. Overall, love it. would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids lost it when this went up. The loft is insane. They bring books up and read for hours. They play chase in it like an obstacle course. My kids are 6 and 8. Both about 50 lbs. they have had 2 more kinds in it. It will move on you if you don't stake it. It's not easy to fold and store, really heavy. We roll it up after it deflates the. Fold it into a shelled storage bin. It did get a small tear I. It about a week after we got it. Most likely from my trying the fold it into the bin. I used some sealer to stop the tear and it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: So far this is doing awesome! We have had a lot of kids coming ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this is doing awesome! We have had a lot of kids coming through just to bounce and it has held up great! We have a 14(almost 15) year old, 12 yr. old, 9 yr old, boys and one little 3 yr old girl and they all play on it consistantly! It has been worth every penny to us. We have thrown 2 kids parties and had and had several play dates and it seems to be holding up great. So I would recommend this bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: Huck78

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome - lots of fun - not perfect
customer_reviews.text: This bouncy has been providing lots of fun for my 3 boys and their friends. It’s very impressive in size, the climbing wall, and clubhouse are bit hits. The slide is fun. It’s easy to set up. It’s not easy to roll it back up and store it. The big negative is the mesh walls don’t provide a strong resistance. A few times kids have jump into the wall - only to tip the wall enough that they land on the grass - while still on the mesh. Like in a pocket. No injuries but the walls should be not so movable. Less wild children would be safer on this. My boys are wild.
customer_reviews.author: Theblackcat’sTwin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of FUN ahead!  Great product worth the extra money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a spectacular addition to our fun days and evenings. Very well product design and safe for kids. I love that it's all contained on the inside. I even jumped and I weigh 135. The flooring is very very durable and strong. Great product. I highly recommend and it's easy breezy to put up-blow up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce house
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bounce house. It’s the only one we could fine with an enclosed slide and bouncing area. The slide has an odd cover connected by Velcro, which moves around a bit, but it can be detached.
customer_reviews.author: MTICoach

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really enjoyed this purchase! She’s 4. The only thing it is VERY heavy because of how big it is. You need at least 2 people to put it up. That’s probably the only down side for me because I have to wait til I know I’ll have someone around to help me put it up! Overall, if you have the money. Buy it. It’s good to drain those kids!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: This bouncy house has been a lifesaver for our 3 kids during social distancing. A little smaller than we pictured but still a good size. The kids do collapse the top section if they are wrestling but that's expected. Great value for the price
customer_reviews.author: Mark Olowinski

customer_reviews.title: My four daughters love the Fort All Sport bouncy house
customer_reviews.text: My four daughters love the Fort All Sport bouncy house. We have had it for about 4 months, and we've used it about 5-6 times. It seems to be holding up well with the exception of one handle on the climbing wall. It is very easy to set up and take down; but be prepared, it is fairly heavy. I did hear a leak and contacted Island Hopper, but they reassured me that it is quite normal and shouldn't be an issue. Overall, we are satisfied with out purchase and the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana B

customer_reviews.title: Toddlers go wild.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! So much fun. Our organization purchased this to use for programming for families with children under 5. It was a huge hit. Large but not too tall to fit in a room with 11 foot ceilings. It is sturdy, well made, and perfect for this age group. It inflates in about a minute, and and kept a big group of toddlers happy for over an hour. They left tired and happy. We intend to use it for programs about once a month. A great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Dinkin

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This is our first bounce house and it has been a big hit for our 6 year old and 4 year old boys! We live in western Kansas so many times, we cannot put it up, because it is way too windy, but that is to be expected in this area. Other than that, we love it, and we have had up to 6 kids (ages 8 and less) in it at a time and no issues! The slide is awesome and the fort is fun for make believe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little pricey for the size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. It only took a few minutes to inflate. I thought it Would have a larger jumping area.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this and it is very sturdy. It is almost commercial grade and holds a lot more kids than the typical store-bought bouncie house.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy K.

customer_reviews.title: Blower is not enough!!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our daughters birthday, it worked well. The blower is not very strong, which I guess should be expected. We might have to replace it. We love the idea of owning this. But the blower doesn’t make my total we bounce! I would like to get into contact with them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Wang

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bounce house to use for birthday parties and to get the wiggles out. It was super easy to set up and take down. The kids spend about 3 hours playing in the bounce house and never get bored. They especially love the hideout and balls. I would reccomend this to a friend or family member for sure.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: The baby bear bounce castle.  Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Great construction, nice and roomy, good value. Not the cheapest bounce house, and far from the most expensive. This one seems to be just right. Takes 10 minutes to set up, and about the same to take down. The kids love it, and I love the fact that everything is all inside the protective net. The kids can go nuts, and I don't have to worry about them getting hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Goliath

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bouncehouse
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our 2 kids summer birthdays (5 & & 7) - she wanted a slide, he wanted a hoop - and this fit the bill. I did a lot of research on bounce houses, compared prices, reviews and this one came out on top. Not disappointed - they spent 3 hours in there on first day. It is heavy to move and bulky for storage but not a big deal. Neighbor kids enjoying it too. Hoping it keeps them amused for sometime to come!
customer_reviews.author: Cath

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: My Grandkids love it! They really love the slide. It is really sturdy and keeps them occupied. I bought balls but ended up not using them for long because they fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Kawaja

customer_reviews.title: My kids love this. The weight limit is high enough adults ...
customer_reviews.text: THis is 100% worth the money. My kids love this. The weight limit is high enough adults can also play on this. Hours of fun.
customer_reviews.author: and

customer_reviews.title: Fun and safe!
customer_reviews.text: Better than described! Very thick material that should last for years. We picked this one because of the safety aspect. The netting protects my kids from falling off the slide and 2nd level of the bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfying
customer_reviews.text: I purchase quick delivery however it’s way smaller than picture and also it says it can carry weight of $500 pounds but when I received it it say 100 pounds only can only for 2 child at a time
customer_reviews.author: Opal Higgins

customer_reviews.title: This bounce house is great! We have 3 kids ages 7
customer_reviews.text: This bounce house is great! We have 3 kids ages 7, 4, and 2. They absolutely love it! It's has plenty of room for all three. Pros- quality construction, versatility, easy setup Cons- blower is loud (as expected), storage (this thing is big!)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice for kids under 5
customer_reviews.text: It's nice for kids under 5. Nothing like the platicar sturdy ones... for the price ... I think it was a little too expensive... but it'll work out for my grandchildren... I won't return it.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio

customer_reviews.title: The kids love it! My only complaint is that it came ...
customer_reviews.text: The island hopper was way bigger than I expected. The kids love it! My only complaint is that it came with a tiny tear and the walls are super flimsy if a child falls. Other than that it is adorable and a lot of fun!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it and it's awesomely unique from everything at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: LNoon

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son, and it was a huge success. I had to fight to get him out of it. Set up and deflation is easy. The only issue is that it is difficult to fit in the included bag. I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a bounce house.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: My 2 1/2 and 7 year old love this bounce house
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 and 7 year old love this bounce house. It's fits all their needs. One loves to slide and jump. The other loves to play soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Kelce Jenson

customer_reviews.title: So Far So good!
customer_reviews.text: The real test will be how this Bounce House ages. But so far, we've been very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: It’s legit.
customer_reviews.text: Day one, packed well, no leaks, kids dig it, motor runs well.
customer_reviews.author: That guy

customer_reviews.title: Quality material, looks good in the yard.
customer_reviews.text: Durable material and a quality product. My kids love it and ask to put it up everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bounce house= sleepy toddler!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bounce house and the fact that the slide is inside the house. Even though this is for older children, we bought it for my 2 1/2 year old and he loves it. I can see him loving it for years to come as well. It does the job! Bouncing all day wears him out and now bedtime isn't a challenge anymore ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: Kids can't wait
customer_reviews.text: We just received and it is the kids gift for Christmas. I will write a updated review once we get a chance to use it this spring.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Worst bounce house I have ever bought. The top blows up and tips over pretty easy. The blower won't stay attached requiring you to reattach multiple times while using.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Definitely feel ripped off after purchasing this for our 7 year old.
customer_reviews.text: The manufacture states this is for 4-10 year olds. More like 3-4 year olds. The bounce house and slide are tiny. Definitely feel ripped off after purchasing this for our 7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: espringer

customer_reviews.title: Best in home daycare ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I have two boys (1 1/2 & 4) and needed something for them to do during this hard quarantine time. I found this online and bought it. It’s now in my front room and my kids play on it for 3-4 hours a day. One of the best investments I have ever made when it comes to giving mom and dad time to work. By far the best investment I have made during these quarantine times. If you have the room to put this inside or outside you need to get it because the kids absolutely love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kody Keroher

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very please ages 11mos 16yrs 19yrs & 39yrs all able to enjoy! Lots of activities for everyone! & many years of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sharona Stokes

product_meta.title: Island Hopper Fort All Sport Recreational Kids Bounce House with Fort Area, Climbing Wall, Basketball, Soccer Shot, Curved Slide & Twist & Tangle Game
feature_bullets: SHIPS SAME BUSINESS DAY AS ORDERED FROM CALIFORNIA MANUFACTURER. The Island Hopper Fort All Sport is perfect for parties and year round play. The 3’ elevated “lookout” area is a soft playhouse accessed by a 4 step climbing wall or climb up from the inside “safe return slide” and then back down for a fast, fun escape to the bounce house floor. Play soft shot soccer or have a slam dunk contest with the included soft soccer/basketball that is included.

Product Features: 7 Sports and Activities - Soccer Goal, Climbing Wall, Basketball Slam Dunk, Play a game of Twist & Tangle with your friends w/ Game Board , Inside Return Curved Slide, Large Jump Floor, and Elevated "Lookout" Play Fort

Max Load: 5 Kids or 500 lbs / Colors: Green, Brown, and Natural / Industry “Excellence in Design” featuring exclusive “Natures Right” bounce houses colored & designed by moms for a natural and aesthetically pleasing toy presence in your yard.
Product Dimensions: 13'x10' Play Surface w/ Reinforced PVC Floor. Safe return slide. / Box Includes: Blower, Stakes, Storage Bag, 1 Ball, Game Board, & Repair Kit (no glue)

Industries best 3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY. Island Hopper products are built to last. When we say "satisfaction guaranteed" we mean it. 30 day free return policy. American company established in 1991 and prides itself in excellent on demand customer service based out of California. To see our videos on YouTube - search Island Hopper products
